casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Lundy, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Lundy (1999), 84 Ohio St.3d 279.]

(No. 98-1579 Submitted November 10, 1998 Decided January 6, 1999.) Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Patrick J. McCarthy, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
